Yet, and in line with the experimental ﬁndings discussed
alternative to deintercalation should also be considered. Thus,
one can postulate possible oxidation/decomposition reactions
yielding other known phases in the Ca
system, which are the potential stable phases according to the
calculated phase diagram in the Materials Project database.
The calculated total energies for such reactions are

decompose. Moreover, under the severe oxidizing conditions
employed, the formation of oxygen containing alternative
phases cannot be completely excluded either.
